body_html: I also encounter heavily increased memory consumption when using batchnorm, but when I use a boolean placeholder to control "training" or not. If I use a plain python boolean, then my memory consumption is much much lower. but my pipeline makes it necessary for me to switch between "training" modes on the fly. For all my experiments, I'm using "trainable=True", and TF1.9
